name: HH_INTVTN_INFO
description: Contains Home Health care plan intervention noadd single items information.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the care plan intervention.

columns.name: INTRVNTION_TYPE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the care plan intervention type ID.  This column links to table INTRVTN_TYPE.

columns.name: INTRVNTION_TYPE_ID_INTRVNTN_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the intervention type.

columns.name: INITIAL_NOTES_ID
columns.description: Care plan intervention initial notes ID.

columns.name: REQ_ORDER_UPDATE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item tracks whether an intervention should require an order when updated.

columns.name: HH_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The associated episode ID for a care plan intervention.
